analysis.description:
SlonpayToken.decimals (/unique_contracts/0x038d5044c7a8e7146763524f84f8850e2805673b.sol#460-462) shadows:
	- Coinbase.decimals (/unique_contracts/0x038d5044c7a8e7146763524f84f8850e2805673b.sol#400-401)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x038d5044c7a8e7146763524f84f8850e2805673b.sol:
	Contract SlonpayToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x038d5044c7a8e7146763524f84f8850e2805673b.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
